EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear { }
If you still issue paper checks to some employees, we should slate a time frame to talk. Your industry has been a great fit for this solution and here are some reasons why:
• Paycards allow managers to focus on more productive activities on payday
• Paycards save time
• Paycards reduce overall payroll costs
• Paycards minimize exposure to check fraud
• Paycards benefit your employees
You simply setup direct deposit in payroll for employees that are issued pay cards. Please let me know when we can connect and I will follow up accordingly.
Sincerely,
